New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the fastest player to score 3,000 T20I runs
Key Match Events: Pakistan thrashed New Zealand by seven wickets at the Pindi Cricket Stadium
Mohammad Amir took two wickets in his first match for Pakistan in almost four years
Abrar Ahmed took two quick wickets in the ninth over
Shadab Khan and Naseem Shah contributed to the remaining wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan now lead the five-match series 1-0 after the first T20I was called off due to rain
